data.title: Petition For Annulment of Marriage
data.meta_description: PETITION FOR ANNULMENT OF MARRIAGE.doc - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. James Yap filed a complaint against Kris Aquino seeking to annul their marriage. They were married in 1999 and had one child together. However, Kris had an affair which resulted in two other children with different men while still married to James. James discovered this while working overseas. He confronted Kris but she did not deny the affairs. James then filed criminal charges against Kris and her paramour for adultery. The court convicted them both. James now seeks to annul the marriage, arguing that Kris was psychologically incapacitated from the start as shown by her irresponsibility, immaturity and infidelity, and that staying married would subject him to further neglect and an unbearable life. He asks the court to declare
